name: Part Three: Escapism (In The Meantime Short Film)

metadata.name: Part Three: Escapism (In The Meantime Short Film) 1
metadata.description:
IN THE MEANTIME is a three-part short film that touches on surveillance, therapy, & the lengths one will go through to find peace.

"Escapism" is the third and final part.

The whole film will serve as a prelude to Heno.'s highly anticipated project "I'm Tired of Being Hypersurveilled".

5% of all Heno.'s 2023 sales will be going directly to social impact organizations.

properties.name: Part Three: Escapism (In The Meantime Short Film)
